{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04943v1", "title": "In memoriam: aspects of Santosh Kumar's work on exact results in RMT", "summary": "Santosh Kumar was an active researcher on the topic of exact results in
random matrix theory and their various applications, particularly to quantum
chaos and information theory. Barely entering his mid-career, he died
unexpectedly on the 18th October 2024. The present article gives an account of
some of his research directions and findings. As well as serving as a tribute
to his work, this is done also for the purpose of providing a resource for
those who may continue along related lines in the future.", "main_category": "math-ph", "categories": "math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-05-08T04:41:31Z"}
